owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

PauserChanged(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an pauser address changed.

RewardAdded(uint256).notice: An event thats emitted when an reward token addet to contract.

RewardPaid(address,uint256).notice: An event thats emitted when an reward token withdrawal from contract.

RewardsDistributionChanged(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an rewards distribution address changed.

Staked(address,uint256).notice: An event thats emitted when an staking token added to contract.

Withdrawn(address,uint256).notice: An event thats emitted when an staking token withdrawal from contract.

pauser().notice: Address that can pause a contract.

periodFinish().notice: Block number of rewards distibution period finish.

rewardPerTokenStored().notice: Static reward distribution amount per block.

rewardsDuration().notice: Blocks count in current distribution period.
